org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer

类 UnionInputGate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer.UnionInputGate
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    InputGate, InputGateListener

    public class UnionInputGate
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputGate, InputGateListener
    Input gate wrapper to union the input from multiple input gates.

    Each input gate has input channels attached from which it reads data. At each input gate, the input channels have unique IDs from 0 (inclusive) to the number of input channels (exclusive). 

     +---+---+      +---+---+---+
 | 0 | 1 |      | 0 | 1 | 2 |
 +--------------+--------------+
 | Input gate 0 | Input gate 1 |
 +--------------+--------------+
    The union input gate maps these IDs from 0 to the *total* number of input channels across all unioned input gates, e.g. the channels of input gate 0 keep their original indexes and the channel indexes of input gate 1 are set off by 2 to 2--4. 
     +---+---++---+---+---+
 | 0 | 1 || 2 | 3 | 4 |
 +--------------------+
 | Union input gate   |
 +--------------------+
    It is possible to recursively union union input gates.

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private InputGateListener inputGateListener
      Registered listener to forward input gate notifications to.

      Gates, which notified this input gate about available data.

      private java.util.Map<InputGate,java.lang.Integer> inputGateToIndexOffsetMap
      A mapping from input gate to (logical) channel index offset.
      private boolean requestedPartitionsFlag
      Flag indicating whether partitions have been requested.
      private int totalNumberOfInputChannels
      The total number of input channels across all unioned input gates.

      • inputGateToIndexOffsetMap

        private final java.util.Map<InputGate,java.lang.Integer> inputGateToIndexOffsetMap
        A mapping from input gate to (logical) channel index offset. Valid channel indexes go from 0 (inclusive) to the total number of input channels (exclusive).
